name: mHIVE
tagline: mHIVE is an Android app for rapid prototyping of haptic feedback.
body:
# mHIVE
mHIVE is a mobile Haptic Instrument for Vibrotactile Exploration, an Android application that enables rapid prototyping of haptic feedback. Part of the [Haptic Jazz project](http://oliverschneider.ca/haptic-jazz/), mHIVE takes inspiration from musical instruments, providing real-time feedback for fast iteration, displaying to multiple outputs to facilitate feedback.

## Author
mHIVE is created and maintained by [Oliver Schneider](oschneid@cs.ubc.ca); contact him at oschneid@cs.ubc.ca if you have any questions.
